attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister said the price of petrol at the pumps should be coming down faster. 

Why does he not reduce tax on fuel this would help everyone. It seems hypercritical when the government takes more from fuel then those that produce and sell fuel?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
